Text: yeah, please, tell us how to install!
For sony ericsson mobiles,just plug the cable that connects the pc and the phone.Usualy,there is a folder called other.Place the *.jar there and open the phone. Then install it.You can send it too!

1. download the file

2. put it on your mobile thru USB (easiest)

3. start it on your mobile

if this doesnt work your mobile doesnt support the game

it does work if u have the right phone wich support the game.
silent hill worked fine on my sone ericson.
1. download it
2. dont even open it with winrar...
3. just right click and send to bluetooth device (turn it on on your phone and your pc)
4. then the phone sould save it in application or game folder (your choice)
5. start and enjoy the game
